## Class [`Form_Container`](Form_Container)

### Implements interface [`Countable`](http://php.net/manual/en/class.countable.php)

- [`int ->count()`](Form_Container.count)

### Implements interface [`Iterator`](http://php.net/manual/en/class.iterator.php)

- [`Form_Element ->current()`](Form_Container.current)
- [`string ->key()`](Form_Container.key)
- [`void ->next()`](Form_Container.next)
- [`void ->rewind()`](Form_Container.rewind)
- [`bool ->valid()`](Form_Container.valid)

### Implements interface [`ArrayAccess`](http://php.net/manual/en/class.arrayaccess.php)

- [`FormElement ->offsetGet($index)`](Form_Container.offsetGet)
- [`void ->offsetSet($index, $value)`](Form_Container.offsetSet)
- [`bool ->offsetExists($index)`](Form_Container.offsetExists)
- [`void ->offsetUnset($index)`](Form_Container.offsetUnset)

### Magic methods

- [`FormElement ->__get($name)`](Form_Container.__get)
- [`void ->__set($name, $value)`](Form_Container.__set)
- [`bool ->__isset($name)`](Form_Container.__isset)
- [`void ->__unset($name)`](Form_Container.__unset)

### Instance methods

- [`$this ->clear_errors($code = null)`](Form_Container.clear_errors)
- [`$this ->set_error($error, $code = null)`](Form_Container.set_error)
- [`$this ->add_error($error, $code = null)`](Form_Container.add_error)
- [`bool ->has_error($code = null)`](Form_Container.has_error)
- [`array ->get_errors($code = null)`](Form_Container.get_errors)
- [`string ->if_error()`](Form_Container.if_error)

## Class [`Form`](Form)

### Extends class [`Form_Container`](Form_Container)

### Static methods

- [`Form ::from_array(array $submission, $name = null)`](Form.from_array)
- [`Form ::from_get($context = null)`](Form.from_get)
- [`Form ::from_post($context = null)`](Form.from_post)
- [`Form ::from_request($context = null)`](Form.from_request)

### Instance methods

- [`bool ->is_submitted()`](Form.is_submitted)
- [`$this ->set_defaults(array $defaults)`](Form.set_defaults)
- [`string ->hidden()`](Form.hidden)
- [`string ->query()`](Form.query)

## Class [`Form_Element`](Form_Element)

### Extends class [`Form_Container`](Form_Container)

### Instance methods

- [`string ->get_name()`](Form_Element.get_name)
- [`string ->get_default()`](Form_Element.get_default)
- [`string ->get_submitted()`](Form_Element.get_submitted)
- [`string ->get_value()`](Form_Element.get_value)
- [`string ->get_id()`](Form_Element.get_id)
- [`string ->as_string()`](Form_Element.as_string)
- [`string ->as_html()`](Form_Element.as_html)
- [`string ->as_url()`](Form_Element.as_url)
- [`string ->name()`](Form_Element.name)
- [`string ->value()`](Form_Element.value)
- [`string ->id($prefix = null, $suffix = null)`](Form_Element.id)
- [`string ->checked($value)`](Form_Element.checked)
- [`string ->selected($value)`](Form_Element.selected)
- [`string ->hidden()`](Form_Element.hidden)
- [`string ->query()`](Form_Element.query)
- [`string ->input($attributes = null)`](Form_Element.input)
- [`string ->password($attributes = null)`](Form_Element.password)
- [`string ->textarea($attributes = null)`](Form_Element.textarea)
- [`string ->checkbox($value, $attributes = null)`](Form_Element.checkbox)
- [`string ->radio($value, $attributes = null)`](Form_Element.radio)
- [`string ->select(array $values, $attributes = null)`](Form_Element.select)
- [`string ->submit($label, $attributes = null)`](Form_Element.submit)
name: PHP-Form
tagline: PHP library for dealing with forms
